decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement (dated March 2016), Flood Risk Assessment, Unnumbered Location Plan, V01, Received: 28/04/2016. EX01, Received: 23/06/2016. PR01, Received: 12/08/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and rear roof extensions with the addition of one front roof window to the the house
